    • Field Detail

      • square_size

        public int square_size
        Allows definition of sprite size from the VGDL description. If indicated, super.block_size is set to this variable. square_size should be divisible by all speeds in the game definition.

      • obs

        public java.lang.String obs
        List of sprites that should not be traversable for the pathfinder. This list can be specified with sprite string identifiers separated by commas.
